enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Chairs of the joint contact groups and the JWG on compliance gave brief presentations to update delegates on progress made on items on the joint SBI/SBSTA agenda.
Their presentations related to progress made on: adverse effects; compliance; AIJ; mechanisms; and capacity building.
SBSTA Chair Dovland (Norway) urged the Parties to intensify their efforts to reach agreement on these issues.
